name: delirium.
description:
Important: This game features flashing images and loud, intrusive sounds.

delirium. is a retro-styled, top-down game that I made for this coming Halloween, it is short but features 3 different endings; see if you can achieve(?) them all. 

Controls:
  • Up/Down Arrow Keys - Move forwards and backwards
  • Left/Right Arrow Keys - Adjust direction to left/right
  • Spacebar - Interact (a prompt will be displayed when an interaction can be performed)
  • Escape Key - Exit the game at any time
Installation:

Extract the .zip folder and run the executable.

Check out my Twitter @heavymaterial for more.
